Ingredients.5: 3  skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, cut into bite-size pieces, or more to taste

Ingredients.6: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  cream of mushroom soup

Ingredients.7: 1 (10 ounce) can diced tomatoes with green chile peppers

Directions.1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Cook spaghetti in boiling water, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 12 minutes. Drain.

Directions.2: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).

Directions.3: Heat olive oil in an oven-proof skillet over medium heat; cook and stir garlic until fragrant, about 1 minute. Add onion; cook and stir until onion begins to soften, about 2 minutes. Add chicken; cook and stir until chicken is no longer pink in the center, about 5 minutes.

Directions.4: Mix cream of mushroom soup and diced tomatoes with green chile peppers into chicken mixture. Mix spaghetti into chicken mixture and top with Colby-Monterey Jack cheese.

Directions.5: Place the skillet in the preheated oven and bake until cheese is melted and slightly brown, 15 to 20 minutes.
